FuncDef:
The reset history-command command deletes the historical commands of the current user.
The reset history-command all-users command deletes the historical commands of all users in the system. The reset history-command command deletes the historical commands of the current user. The reset history-command all-users command deletes the historical commands of all users in the system.
ExtraInfo:
To delete the historical commands of the current user, run the reset history-command command.
The reset history-command all-users command clears the query result of the display history-command all-users command, without affecting the query result of the display history-command command.
